blog.name: jhopeme21
blog.title: JHopeMe21
blog.description: MasterList

title: BTS Fluffy Scenarios
body:
Just some fluffy scenarios that fry your potatoes:

Kim Seokjin

“Y/N!” Hoseok calls, “Your boyfriend wants you.” He points to the Pac Man game machine, where Jin awaits you. As Hoseok wanders off, you approach Jin, your mind wandering. “Look. I beat your high score!” He jabs a finger onto the screen and you stare at him, puzzled. Leaning over to view the screen, you laugh.

“But Jin, I don’t even play Pac-”

“It got you over here, didn’t it?”

You smirk, Jin pulling you close to him. “Today has been fun. Laser tag, go-cart racing, all of it.” He smiles, grabbing your hand. “Happy two year anniversary, hmm?”

“Happy anniversary,” you say, putting a hand on his chest. Before you can blink, he spins you around, slamming you against the game machine for a kiss.

Min Yoongi

You’ve always wanted to be here, you think as you cross the bridge towards the park. It’s a beautiful place, one that you’d always dreamed of moving to someday. But you’re on vacation now. You take in the smells of the air and the wind blowing in your face, turning around slightly as you enter the park gates. The trees sway, and you realize how warm it has been from what you expected. You pull a book from your bag and sit on the first park bench you see, smiling as you open it to the last page you’d read. You watch the people for a moment before diving into your book- so drowned in what you are reading, you only vaguely notice someone sitting on the other end of the bench. Whoever it is, rises suddenly, and then you feel an arm across your shoulder.

“You should really be careful who you let sit beside you when you’re reading, you know,” a deep voice says quietly. You look next to you and don’t see anyone, so immediately you jerk your head to the right. Min Yoongi is standing behind the bench, his arm draped around your shoulder.

“I really… Wow. You’re Suga, from BTS.”

“I am.”

“You’re here… Without security.” You announce, feeling shy and confident all at once. The real, live Min Yoongi was here, and he’s approached you.

“Wow. Beauty and brains, too.” He winks, showing off his gummy smile and raising a handsome eyebrow.

“Why?”

Yoongi smirks and crosses around to sit next to you again. You can’t help your heart’s flutter as he scoots closer and places a hand on your knee. “What can I say? I’m a rebel. And I saw you coming down here to read.”

You blink. “You like… You like girls that read?” You laugh so hard you begin this snort. He smirks again and pokes your nose, “That’s cute, too, y'know.” He stands up, looking down at you quietly. You stare at your shorts and tank top, wondering what he’s looking at.

“You want to grab lunch? Or are you too busy reading?”

“I’m too busy reading,” You tease.

“Seriously?” He genuinely looks hurt. “I figured since I was from BTS…”

“Lunch sounds great, Mr. Confident.” You join him and the two of you walk arm-in-arm to the nearest cafe.

Jung Hoseok

“I’m so glad we went out tonight!” Hoseok yells, his hand on the small of your back as you dance.

“I’m having a great time!” You nod, feeling the music in your feet, the song moving you to dance even closer to him.

“Alright, everybody! The last slow song of the night! Dance with someone special!” The deejay calls.

As the music starts, you start to walk from the dance floor.

“Y/N!” Hobi calls, reaching out to you.

“What?” You look back and see him grinning.

“You heard the man.” Hoseok takes your hands in his and places them on his shoulders. “I have to dance with someone special.”

Kim Namjoon

You walk to the beach holding a blue towel and tanning lotion. Today is a beautiful, sunny day and you want to enjoy it. As you start laying out your towel over the sand, you trip over a lump of dirt. “Ah!” You gasp as you land on the ground. “Oh, Joy.” You mutter as you wipe off the sand on your legs. Running footsteps make it to you and stop.

“You okay, Ma’am?” A kind voice surprises you.

“Yeah, yeah I’m- I’m fine.” He offers you a tan hand and you take it as he pulls you back up to your feet. You look up at your generous helper and blush. It’s Kim Namjoon. Shirtless. And smiling at you.

“Th-thank you..” You stutter nervously. “For helping me up.”

His brown eyes are shining as he stares into yours. “Anytime, Ma’am. Namjoon.” He shakes your hand and you realize you never let go from when he helped you up.

“Y/N.” You grin timidly.

“Nice to meet you, Y/N. Would you like to get a drink?”

Your heart skips a beat but you refuse to let the nerves get to you.

“I’d love to.”

Hand in hand, Namjoon leads you to a food stand and all you can think is, ’Wow.’

Park Jimin

It’s your birthday and after almost one year of dating, Jimin tells you he’s going to do something super special for you. “Pack a picnic basket and meet me on the beach, okay?” he says quietly on the phone. Your parents are home and you’ve been talking to Jimin over the phone late at night. Trying to keep quiet, you rifle through your cabinets after hanging up and pack a few sandwiches and drinks for the two of you. “A late night picnic?” You mumble as you sneakily step from the back door. The beach is only a small walk away, and you make your way down to your favorite spot. It was where you and Jimin had kissed for the first time, where he had asked you to be his girlfriend officially, and where you were about to spend your romantic picnic. You spread a towel and empty out the basket, gazing at the night stars while you wait. You feel the sand shift behind you before you feel hands over your eyes, yet you gasp anyway to play along. “Who could that be?” You tease, turning slightly to see Jimin on his knees behind you.

“Hey, [Y/N],” he says, wrapping an arm delicately around you and crossing his legs. “Good. Sandwiches.” He winks, grabbing up one for himself.

“What’s the surprise?” You ask, eager and ready to find out.

“What? A surprise? Can’t this be it?” His smile so wide his eyes disappear.

“There’s something. I can feel it.”

Jimin shrugs and you giggle, leaning over quickly to kiss him. Mid-kiss, you hear a faint buzzing sound. “What’s that?”

“I don’t know.” Jimin grins, but you know it’s the surprise. You stand up and take off towards the sound. Now shin-deep in the ocean water, you look back over your shoulder.

“What is it?” You call back to him.

“You know, you really look beautiful standing there like that.” He says, approaching you. You feel a faint prickly feeling and look up. The buzzing sound had gotten tremendously loud, and up above was a small copter, hovering over the two of you.

Rose petals begin to fall on your head. You stare up at the sky, catching the bright red flutters in the moonlight. Jimin puts his arm around you and grins. “Happy Birthday, Y/N. I love you.”

Kim Taehyung

You smile as you press your lips to his. “You know what? You can’t let them change who you are, Tae. That’s what the song is about.”

Taehyung leans his head to the side and kisses you again softly. “This…” He holds up the song lyrics in his hand and then drops the paper to his side. “This is the sweetest thing anyone has ever done for me. I mean it.”

“I mean it. Every word. I hope you like the song.”

“And you wrote it, Y/N?”

“Yes.” You shyly back away from him and smile. Bringing the tune back to your head, you begin to sing. “I am who I am, and nothing’s gonna change that, I am here to say that I am who I am; I believe what I believe and I’m chasing my dreams…”

It’s quiet. Taehyung looks at you with longing and smiles widely. “I think… You know I think that song would make a perfect addition to the album.”

You gasp. “You mean it?”

“Yes.” He steps forward and places his hands on your arms. “I mean it. You, babe, have given me something to sing about. After all this hate, after all the fans who’ve said horrible things about me… I am who I am. And you just showed me that.”

You can’t help it. You throw him into the biggest hug imaginable. “I love you, Kim Taehyung. Forever and ever,” you mumble into his chest.

“I love you, Y/N,” he replies, staring into your eyes. He kisses you again, and you feel the sparks, just like the first time you’d kissed him almost three years ago. And you know deep in your heart that the sparks will never fade.

Jeon Jungkook

Jungkook holds your hand as the two of you make your way into the movie theater. “So what movie would you like to see?” He asks as he looks at you. You think for a moment.

“A romantic comedy maybe?” You look at all the movie posters and something catches your eye. “Actually no! Let’s see that superhero movie!” You know how much your boyfriend loves superheroes and plus, you enjoy a good action film every now and then.

“You know me so well, Y/N.” Jungkook chuckles. He buys the two of you popcorn and drinks. Before the movie starts he whispers in your ear, “Who’s your favorite superhero?“ You hold eyes with him for a moment as a smile fills your face. You lean in and kiss him quickly before you speak.

"You know what, Kook? I’d have to say you.”

He lets out a soft laugh and smiles towards the ground. “Me? What for?” When he looks back at you, the memory of the first day the two of you met begins to surface.

“For showing me love really does exist.”

Jungkook holds your hand as the two of you make your way into the movie theater. “So what movie would you like to see?” He asks as he looks at you. You think for a moment.

“A romantic comedy maybe?” You look at all the movie posters and something catches your eye. “Actually no! Let’s see that superhero movie!” You know how much your boyfriend loves superheroes and plus, you enjoy a good action film every now and then.

“You know me so well, Y/N.” Jungkook chuckles. He buys the two of you popcorn and drinks. Before the movie starts he whispers in your ear, “Who’s your favorite superhero?“ You hold eyes with him for a moment as a smile fills your face. You lean in and kiss him quickly before you speak.

"You know what, Kook? I’d have to say you.”

He lets out a soft laugh and smiles towards the ground. “Me? What for?” When he looks back at you, the memory of the first day the two of you met begins to surface.

“For showing me love really does exist.”

trail.content_raw:
Just some fluffy scenarios that fry your potatoes:

Kim Seokjin

“Y/N!” Hoseok calls, “Your boyfriend wants you.” He points to the Pac Man game machine, where Jin awaits you. As Hoseok wanders off, you approach Jin, your mind wandering. “Look. I beat your high score!” He jabs a finger onto the screen and you stare at him, puzzled. Leaning over to view the screen, you laugh.

“But Jin, I don’t even play Pac-”

“It got you over here, didn’t it?”

You smirk, Jin pulling you close to him. “Today has been fun. Laser tag, go-cart racing, all of it.” He smiles, grabbing your hand. “Happy two year anniversary, hmm?”

“Happy anniversary,” you say, putting a hand on his chest. Before you can blink, he spins you around, slamming you against the game machine for a kiss.

Min Yoongi

You’ve always wanted to be here, you think as you cross the bridge towards the park. It’s a beautiful place, one that you’d always dreamed of moving to someday. But you’re on vacation now. You take in the smells of the air and the wind blowing in your face, turning around slightly as you enter the park gates. The trees sway, and you realize how warm it has been from what you expected. You pull a book from your bag and sit on the first park bench you see, smiling as you open it to the last page you’d read. You watch the people for a moment before diving into your book- so drowned in what you are reading, you only vaguely notice someone sitting on the other end of the bench. Whoever it is, rises suddenly, and then you feel an arm across your shoulder.

“You should really be careful who you let sit beside you when you’re reading, you know,” a deep voice says quietly. You look next to you and don’t see anyone, so immediately you jerk your head to the right. Min Yoongi is standing behind the bench, his arm draped around your shoulder.

“I really… Wow. You’re Suga, from BTS.”

“I am.”

“You’re here… Without security.” You announce, feeling shy and confident all at once. The real, live Min Yoongi was here, and he’s approached you.

“Wow. Beauty and brains, too.” He winks, showing off his gummy smile and raising a handsome eyebrow.

“Why?”

Yoongi smirks and crosses around to sit next to you again. You can’t help your heart’s flutter as he scoots closer and places a hand on your knee. “What can I say? I’m a rebel. And I saw you coming down here to read.”

You blink. “You like… You like girls that read?” You laugh so hard you begin this snort. He smirks again and pokes your nose, “That’s cute, too, y'know.” He stands up, looking down at you quietly. You stare at your shorts and tank top, wondering what he’s looking at.

“You want to grab lunch? Or are you too busy reading?”

“I’m too busy reading,” You tease.

“Seriously?” He genuinely looks hurt. “I figured since I was from BTS…”

“Lunch sounds great, Mr. Confident.” You join him and the two of you walk arm-in-arm to the nearest cafe.

Jung Hoseok

“I’m so glad we went out tonight!” Hoseok yells, his hand on the small of your back as you dance.

“I’m having a great time!” You nod, feeling the music in your feet, the song moving you to dance even closer to him.

“Alright, everybody! The last slow song of the night! Dance with someone special!” The deejay calls.

As the music starts, you start to walk from the dance floor.

“Y/N!” Hobi calls, reaching out to you.

“What?” You look back and see him grinning.

“You heard the man.” Hoseok takes your hands in his and places them on his shoulders. “I have to dance with someone special.”

Kim Namjoon

You walk to the beach holding a blue towel and tanning lotion. Today is a beautiful, sunny day and you want to enjoy it. As you start laying out your towel over the sand, you trip over a lump of dirt. “Ah!” You gasp as you land on the ground. “Oh, Joy.” You mutter as you wipe off the sand on your legs. Running footsteps make it to you and stop.

“You okay, Ma’am?” A kind voice surprises you.

“Yeah, yeah I’m- I’m fine.” He offers you a tan hand and you take it as he pulls you back up to your feet. You look up at your generous helper and blush. It’s Kim Namjoon. Shirtless. And smiling at you.

“Th-thank you..” You stutter nervously. “For helping me up.”

His brown eyes are shining as he stares into yours. “Anytime, Ma’am. Namjoon.” He shakes your hand and you realize you never let go from when he helped you up.

“Y/N.” You grin timidly.

“Nice to meet you, Y/N. Would you like to get a drink?”

Your heart skips a beat but you refuse to let the nerves get to you.

“I’d love to.”

Hand in hand, Namjoon leads you to a food stand and all you can think is, ’Wow.’

Park Jimin

It’s your birthday and after almost one year of dating, Jimin tells you he’s going to do something super special for you. “Pack a picnic basket and meet me on the beach, okay?” he says quietly on the phone. Your parents are home and you’ve been talking to Jimin over the phone late at night. Trying to keep quiet, you rifle through your cabinets after hanging up and pack a few sandwiches and drinks for the two of you. “A late night picnic?” You mumble as you sneakily step from the back door. The beach is only a small walk away, and you make your way down to your favorite spot. It was where you and Jimin had kissed for the first time, where he had asked you to be his girlfriend officially, and where you were about to spend your romantic picnic. You spread a towel and empty out the basket, gazing at the night stars while you wait. You feel the sand shift behind you before you feel hands over your eyes, yet you gasp anyway to play along. “Who could that be?” You tease, turning slightly to see Jimin on his knees behind you.

“Hey, [Y/N],” he says, wrapping an arm delicately around you and crossing his legs. “Good. Sandwiches.” He winks, grabbing up one for himself.

“What’s the surprise?” You ask, eager and ready to find out.

“What? A surprise? Can’t this be it?” His smile so wide his eyes disappear.

“There’s something. I can feel it.”

Jimin shrugs and you giggle, leaning over quickly to kiss him. Mid-kiss, you hear a faint buzzing sound. “What’s that?”

“I don’t know.” Jimin grins, but you know it’s the surprise. You stand up and take off towards the sound. Now shin-deep in the ocean water, you look back over your shoulder.

“What is it?” You call back to him.

“You know, you really look beautiful standing there like that.” He says, approaching you. You feel a faint prickly feeling and look up. The buzzing sound had gotten tremendously loud, and up above was a small copter, hovering over the two of you.

Rose petals begin to fall on your head. You stare up at the sky, catching the bright red flutters in the moonlight. Jimin puts his arm around you and grins. “Happy Birthday, Y/N. I love you.”

Kim Taehyung

You smile as you press your lips to his. “You know what? You can’t let them change who you are, Tae. That’s what the song is about.”

Taehyung leans his head to the side and kisses you again softly. “This…” He holds up the song lyrics in his hand and then drops the paper to his side. “This is the sweetest thing anyone has ever done for me. I mean it.”

“I mean it. Every word. I hope you like the song.”

“And you wrote it, Y/N?”

“Yes.” You shyly back away from him and smile. Bringing the tune back to your head, you begin to sing. “I am who I am, and nothing’s gonna change that, I am here to say that I am who I am; I believe what I believe and I’m chasing my dreams…”

It’s quiet. Taehyung looks at you with longing and smiles widely. “I think… You know I think that song would make a perfect addition to the album.”

You gasp. “You mean it?”

“Yes.” He steps forward and places his hands on your arms. “I mean it. You, babe, have given me something to sing about. After all this hate, after all the fans who’ve said horrible things about me… I am who I am. And you just showed me that.”

You can’t help it. You throw him into the biggest hug imaginable. “I love you, Kim Taehyung. Forever and ever,” you mumble into his chest.

“I love you, Y/N,” he replies, staring into your eyes. He kisses you again, and you feel the sparks, just like the first time you’d kissed him almost three years ago. And you know deep in your heart that the sparks will never fade.

Jeon Jungkook

Jungkook holds your hand as the two of you make your way into the movie theater. “So what movie would you like to see?” He asks as he looks at you. You think for a moment.

“A romantic comedy maybe?” You look at all the movie posters and something catches your eye. “Actually no! Let’s see that superhero movie!” You know how much your boyfriend loves superheroes and plus, you enjoy a good action film every now and then.

“You know me so well, Y/N.” Jungkook chuckles. He buys the two of you popcorn and drinks. Before the movie starts he whispers in your ear, “Who’s your favorite superhero?“ You hold eyes with him for a moment as a smile fills your face. You lean in and kiss him quickly before you speak.

"You know what, Kook? I’d have to say you.”

He lets out a soft laugh and smiles towards the ground. “Me? What for?” When he looks back at you, the memory of the first day the two of you met begins to surface.

“For showing me love really does exist.”

summary:
Bad Time For A Good Time - 
Chapter 11: I got you.
Jungkook x Reader, Namjoon x Reader
Warning: Cursing.
Prev| Next 
Jeon...
body:
Bad Time For A Good Time -

Chapter 11: I got you.

Jungkook x Reader, Namjoon x Reader

Warning: Cursing.

Prev| Next

Jeon Jungkook is the ultimate bachelor; guarded, angry, rich, body count that puts the numeric system to shame, and aimless - what else could a girl want? You’ve been working in the same dead end job, hoping it would get you somewhere. You finally have your foot in the door, and the person you need to win over is slamming your foot out. What can you do?

I will be posting every day at 10am AKST! I don’t have links included in my posts, because tumblr still messes with it, but all the links are in my masterlist! 🖤

Post time per time zone:

AKST - 10am

PST - 11am

MST - 12pm

CST - 1pm

EST - 2pm
